sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnrecentsrchwrd ( SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_ID /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_NM /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_CO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #srchwrdManageId# /* */ , #recentSrchwrdId# /* */ , #recentSrchwrdNm# /* */ , #recentSrchwrdCo# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnrecentsrchwrd SET SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID=#srchwrdManageId# /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_ID=#recentSrchwrdId# /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_NM=#recentSrchwrdNm# /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_CO=#recentSrchwrdCo# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID=#srchwrdManageId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_ID /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_NM /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_CO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnrecentsrchwrd WHERE SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID=#srchwrdManageId# /* */

SELECT SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_ID /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_NM /* */ , RECENT_SRCHWRD_CO /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnrecentsrchwrd WHERE 1=1
SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
RECENT_SRCHWRD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnrecentsrchwrd WHERE 1=1
SRCHWRD_MANAGE_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
RECENT_SRCHWRD_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
